required_fields.label: Title BB (EN)
required_fields.description: The main title describing the product

required_fields.label: Short Description BB (EN)
required_fields.description: A single paragraph that describes the product in 400 characters or fewer. Introduce the product and call out a couple of key features and their benefits.

required_fields.label: Brand Name
required_fields.description: Up to 20 characters. Do not use the less-than or greater-than characters.

required_fields.label: Primary UPC
required_fields.description: 12 OR 13 Digits/Number. Acceptable UPC TYPE: UPC-A and EAN13. Not mandatory for non-inventory products.

required_fields.label: Model Number
required_fields.description: Model number or name of the product (Up to 20 char). Do not use the less-than or greater-than characters.

required_fields.label: Manufacturer's Part Number
required_fields.description: Alphanumeric - up to 30 chars. Do not use the less-than or greater-than characters. Required to order from vendor. Case/character sensitive for EDI transmission. Not Mandatory for non-inventory set-up

required_fields.label: Product Condition
required_fields.description: Brand new = sealed and unused. Open box = packaging has been opened, product is unused. Refurbished products have been used but inspected and restored to 100% functionality. Refurbs are graded on cosmetic condition: Excellent = no visible blemishes, Good = minor blemishes, Fair = noticeable blemishes. Warranty of 1 year must be provided for Brand New, Open Box, and Refurb Excellent. Warranty of min. 90 days for Refurb Good and Fair.

required_fields.label: 01 - Image Source (Main Image)
required_fields.description: Provide a source for the main image of the product. Enter a publicly available image URL or upload an image. Minimum size 500x500. Max size 10 MB.

recommended_fields.label: 02 - Image Source
recommended_fields.description: Provide a source for an additional image of the product. Enter a publicly available image URL or upload an image. Minimum size 500x500. Max size 10 MB.

recommended_fields.label: Long Description BB (EN)
recommended_fields.description: More detailed item information that's relevant to consumers.

recommended_fields.label: Screen Size
recommended_fields.description: Indicate the screen size measured diagonally in inches (e.g. 13.3 in)

recommended_fields.label: Convertible/Hybrid Display
recommended_fields.description: Choose Yes if laptop folds/swivels into a tablet or screen detaches, turning the machine into tablet mode, otherwise choose No.

recommended_fields.label: Processor Type (EN)
recommended_fields.description: Brand and model of the processor type only. Do not list generation. (e.g. Intel Core i5 350M)

recommended_fields.label: RAM Size
recommended_fields.description: Indicate the RAM size in GB.

recommended_fields.label: Solid-State Drive Capacity
recommended_fields.description: Please indicate the total capacity of all solid-state drives included, in GB or TB (e.g. 100 GB, 256 GB, 1 TB, etc.) Please do not include hard disk drive capacity.

recommended_fields.label: Graphics Card (EN)
recommended_fields.description: Name and model of graphics chipset (e.g. ATI Mobility Radeon HD 4250)

recommended_fields.label: Colour (EN)
recommended_fields.description: Main colour of the product (e.g. Harbour Mist, Beige, Lavender etc). Please separate multiple colours using semicolons.

recommended_fields.label: Platform
recommended_fields.description: Please choose an option from the drop down list that best describes the product.

recommended_fields.label: Web Hierarchy Location
recommended_fields.description: Please provide the ID for the requested web hierarchy location as per the provided mapping details. Use the following format: BB_123456.

recommended_fields.label: Variant Group Code
recommended_fields.description: The variant group code attribute is used to group products in the same variant groups together. Please visit https://sellerhub.bestbuy.ca/s/article/Product-Variants to learn more.
